Content: Looking at speeds of much larger bikes and comparing them to my fairly small 1973 Honda CB350, it was faster than a lot of the new bikes with larger engines. I take it that the biggest reason is compression and gearing of the CB350. Why are the newer bikes so seemingly underpowered?

Title: My CB350 Was Faster
